item.title: Best Pet Supplies Foam Pet Steps for Small Dogs and Cats, Portable Ramp Stairs for Couch, Sofa, and High Bed Climbing, Non-Slip Balanced Indoor Step Support, Paw Safe
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Price: (as of – Details) Make it easier for your small-to-medium dogs and cats to climb onto furniture and then get back down all by themselves with foam pet stairs offering well-balanced stability. If you love your pets as much as we do you really enjoy when they come up into bed or onto the ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $89.99 - $75.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 11:35:49 UTC – Details)


Make it easier for your small-to-medium dogs and cats to climb onto furniture and then get back down all by themselves with foam pet stairs offering well-balanced stability. If you love your pets as much as we do you really enjoy when they come up into bed or onto the couch to give you a snuggle. But if your pet is too small or getting older they can’t always jump up and down to do it themselves. And if you’re not always around to help them or you’re getting a bit old yourself, sometimes you need a little extra help. We developed the Best Pet Supplies Foam Pet Stairs as a simple, effective way to get them up and down while putting less stress on you both. Featuring a non-slip bottom these fabric-covered stairs in 3-step, 4-step, and 5-step sizes simply push right up to the edge so they can climb up or get down quickly, easily, and safely. Product Details: Pet Stairs for Couch, Bed, and Sofa; Supports Small to Medium Dogs and Cats; Heavy-Duty CertiPUR-US Certified Foam; Well-Balanced, Reliable Support for Pets; Lightweight and Portable for Whole Home Use; Soft Fabric Exterior for Paw-Friendly Support; Available in Multiple Colors to Match Home Decor; Help your small dog or aging cat get up on the couch or bed more easily with a soft, supportive foam pet stair system from Best Pet Supplies designed specifically for your four-legged friends. Get one now by clicking Add to Cart above.
Product Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 30 x 16 x 22.5 inches; 5.78 Pounds
Item model number ‏ : ‎ ST235C-L
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ October 12, 2020
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ Best Pet Supplies, Inc.
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B08L42MKC3
Country of Origin ‏ : ‎ USA

CertiPUR-US Certified Foam: To ensure that your pet gets the safest quality steps, we made sure that our USA sourced foams are CertiPUR-US Certified. CertiPUR-US Certified foams are manufactured without ozone depleters, PDBW flame retardants, mercury, lead and other substances/chemicals that can be harmful to your pets.
Reduces Strain on Older Adults – Our versatile dog steps not only help your pets they minimize the need for you to have to pick up your animal to get them up on the furniture, which is especially important if you struggle with strength or stability
Multiple Step Size Options – Ideal for small to medium sized pets these steps for dogs and cats come in 3-step, 4-step, and 5-step options, so you can use them as dog stairs for beds or pet stairs for cats who need help climbing on a sofa
Trendy Home Decor Colors – We want our dog stairs for high beds and couches to better match your living room, bedroom, or personal space which is why they’re available in 17 different colors and patterns to fit your individual style

Read more

Stability For All Ages

With an anti-slip bottom and 15 or 16 inch width, your dog or cat will climb effortlessly to their favorite spots.

CertiPUR-US Certified Foam*

Crafted from CertiPUR-US certified foams, these pet stairs are made without ozone depleters, PDBW flame retardants, mercury, lead and other substances/chemicals that can be harmful to your pets.

Certificate Issued: September 25, 2018 Alliance for Flexible Polyurethane Foam/CertiPUR-US program.

Cushion Every Step

The mattress-grade foam inside cushions and supports your pet’s every step reducing stress and relieving pressure on their paws and joints.

Easy to Keep Clean

All sizes of steps come with a completely removable cover that is machine washable. All our fabrics are pleasing to the touch and the eyes. With different options to choose from, it will be easy to maintain your household’s good vibes.

Read more

Sizes Available:

– Small: 15″W x 13.5″H x 18″L.

– Medium: 15″W x 18″H x 24″L.

– Large: 16″W x 22.5″H x 30″L.

Different Heights For Different Spaces

Does your dog need just a little help getting on the couch? Is your cat finding it difficult to reach his favorite window? Give them ultimate access with our 3 ranges of height.

The large is 22 1/2″ inches in height, giving your pet access to taller places within your home. The medium reaches 18″ in height, allowing for a simple climb to reach a snuggle session. The small steps are 13 1/2″ tall, for a simple boost up to a favorite window sill.

  • Our steps are easy to move around your home or take on the go for some adventures. Never worry about your pet’s accessibility anymore, with Pet Supplies Foam Pet Stairs!

Read more





Dark Grey with White Lattice Print
Brown Linen
Grey Corduroy
Grey Linen
Dark Brown Suede
Paws-Black Fleece
3 Step 15″W x 13.5″H x 18″L 15″W x 13.5″H x 18″L 15″W x 13.5″H x 18″L 15″W x 13.5″H x 18″L 15″W x 13.5″H x 18″L 15″W x 13.5″H x 18″L
4 Step 15″W x 18″H x 24″L 15″W x 18″H x 24″L 15″W x 18″H x 24″L 15″W x 18″H x 24″L 15″W x 18″H x 24″L 15″W x 18″H x 24″L

All the materials are 100% healthy, so even if the dog keeps biting the rope, it will not cause damage to their teeth. ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $7.99 - $5.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 06:19:51 UTC – Details)



【Premium & Sturdy Material】Made of high-quality nylon strap and extra loud tinkle bell, this premium dog ring bell for going outside is durable, sturdy, bite-resistant, and non-toxic. All the materials are 100% healthy, so even if the dog keeps biting the rope, it will not cause damage to their teeth. A must-have for daily training and playing.
【Adjustable Length & 7 Doorbells】Unlike other puppies supplies on the market, this durable go outside dog bell has a 3-snap design so that the length can be adjusted easily according to your training needs. The 7 bells can make a loud sound to let you notice the dog’s needs and solve them in time.
【Wide Application】With top-quality material, superior craftsmanship, and humane design, these pet training bells are suitable for small, medium, large dogs, or even cats! It is also a great gift idea for your friends or family who love pets and want to train them well.
【What Can You Get】The package comes with 1 x Doggy Train Doorbells. We are so sure that you will fall in love with these puppy accessories and provide a 30-day money-back warranty and 24-house online customer service for all people. What are you waiting for? It’s Time to Do Some Training!

18 Vibrant Colored Fine Liner Marker Pens from ​iBayam

Lets you express yourself with true style and color. Available in 18 colors with an ultra fine tip. The iBayam fine liner marker pen set provides bold and expressive lines and is great for editing documents and papers. This writing instrument features point guard technology to protect the felt tip, as well as a water-based ink that doesn’t bleed through paper.

MULTIFUNCTIONAL FINELINER PENS

The iBayam fine line pen set is ideal for journaling, planner, drawing lines & details, writing, sketching, adult coloring books, art projects, artists fine-ink drawings and coloring small intricate patterns. Doesn’t bleed through paper.

Classic writing tool in modern colors

Our products are comfortable to use and last long. Well, When you need precision and clarity in your color drawings. There’s no better way to get it than with a fine liner pen set!

Inspired Coloring Marker Pens, Comfortable in your daily life

Slim easy-to-control shape and a smooth fine porous point come together to help you perfect and personalize your coloring sheet. Turn everyday writing into 18 colors with iBayam fineliner Pens. Treat yourself to a range of water-based ink that won’t bleed through paper. Enjoy juicy, nonstop writing and drawing thanks to some kind person. Add a pop of fun color to journals, planner, notebook, notes, drawings, adult coloring pages.

Water-based ink

The water-based ink is specifically designed to reduce smearing and not bleed through paper for neat notes, doodles and adult coloring pages. Perfect for drawing lines & details, journaling, coloring, writing, sketching, marking, signing, manga, animation, graphic and design.

Compatible with Stencils

GREAT marker pens for drawing lines & details, journal, planner, calendar, agenda, notebook, note taking, painting, writing, coloring, sketch, marker, signing, manga, animation, graphic, design, illustration, included artists fine-ink drawings and coloring small intricate patterns. Perfect Colored Pens for Middle School, High School, College, Bachelor, Graduate, Women, Men, Adult Coloring.
Colored art writing drawing porous point pens. Water-based ink, minimal bleed thru (except very thin paper), these fiber-tipped pens create fine lines and intense water-based colors. Packaged in a soft transparent vinyl bag.
WELL PACKAGE — Our fine line pens come in a nice plastic storage case with fold over snap closure which can be easily placed in backpacks. For using in school, travel or used in the home and office. item.title: Best Pet Supplies Crinkle Dog Toy for Small, Medium, and Large Breeds, Cute No Stuffing Duck with Soft Squeaker, Fun for Indoor Puppies and Senior Pups, Plush No Mess Chew and Play
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Price: (as of – Details) Give Your Dog an Active Play Outlet with a Soft Crinkle Paper Dog Toy from Best Pet Supplies We all want to give our dogs a healthy way to play, have fun, and enjoy staying active; especially when it comes to giving them toys that are less messy and stand ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $5.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 05:20:14 UTC – Details)


Give Your Dog an Active Play Outlet with a Soft Crinkle Paper Dog Toy from Best Pet Supplies We all want to give our dogs a healthy way to play, have fun, and enjoy staying active; especially when it comes to giving them toys that are less messy and stand up to all the biting, chewing, and tugging. That’s why we created these super cute, high-quality Best Pet Supplies Duck-Shaped Dog Toys with built-in squeaker and crinkle paper. These versatile toys for dogs give them multiple ways to play and stay engaged while satisfying their natural behavioral needs. And because there’s no stuffing you don’t have to worry about cleaning up a big mess the moment your dog rips into them. Product Details: Soft Duck Dog Toy Built-In Squeezable Squeaker Crinkle Paper Interior No Stuffing or Fluff Available in 6 Fun Colors Overall Length: 15”
Product Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 15.5 x 7.5 x 1.5 inches; 0.63 Ounces
Item model number ‏ : ‎ PT332
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ July 27, 2021
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ Best Pet Supplies, LLC
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B09BBM5CX8
Country of Origin ‏ : ‎ China

Cute and Colorful Duck Shape – Shaped like a real duck these dog crinkle toys for small dogs, medium dogs, and every size in between comes in 6 unique colors and provides a more puppy friendly shape that’s easy to carry around
No Fluff, No Mess Design – Unlike messy bones, ropes, or other toys for aggressive chewers these dog crinkle toys won’t leave behind a mess after they’re done playing. They also boast reinforced fabric and stitching to help them hold up to chewing
Active Play, Tossing, and Retrieving – Our cute duck chew toys for dogs can be used for bonding with your puppy, reducing stress or separation anxiety, or simply giving them an active outlet for channeling aggression or intense play


Read more





Cleaning Made Easy

Need to get that toy cleaned from drools or dirt? Just toss it into the washing machine on gentle cycle and tumble dry on low heat.

Soft, Plush, and Durable

We use higher-quality materials in our dog toys to ensure they hold up to regular chewing, biting, tugging, and pulling. If the squeaker or the paper comes out simply discard them and you can continue to let your dog play with the duck for as long as it’s still chewable.

Audible Play Sounds

The crinkle paper in the body and the squeaker in the head give dogs multiple outlets for stimulating their auditory and physical senses. These distinct sounds will keep them having fun far longer than standard toys, so they can relieve stress, stay focused, and even reduce aggressive behaviors.

Adorable Variety

At 15” in size these colorful ducks are more fun for young puppies and older dogs alike because they feature multiple “chew points” and they’re a better shape for carrying.

Read more



4.5
Price: $5.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 05:20:14 UTC – Details)

Warranty & Support

Amazon.com Return Policy:You may return any new computer purchased from Amazon.com that is “dead on arrival,” arrives in damaged condition, or is still in unopened boxes, for a full refund within 30 days of purchase. Amazon.com reserves the right to test “dead on arrival” returns and impose a customer fee equal to 15 percent of the product sales price if the customer misrepresents the condition of the product. Any returned computer that is damaged through customer misuse, is missing parts, or is in unsellable condition due to customer tampering will result in the customer being charged a higher restocking fee based on the condition of the product. Amazon.com will not accept returns of any desktop or notebook computer more than 30 days after you receive the shipment. New, used, and refurbished products purchased from Marketplace vendors are subject to the returns policy of the individual vendor.

Product Warranty: For warranty information about this product, please click here

Product Description

Why choose WALI? WALI is committed to building high-quality products and mounting solutions for every budget and everyone. From monitor mounts to speaker mounts and projector mounts, our collections achieve the optimal balance between functionality, design, and aesthetics.

STT003

Monitor Stand Riser

What benefits can we get from WALI monitor stand riser?

To create a comfortable viewing position and better healthy posture.

Give more valuable desktop space underneath the stand for storage.

Weight Capacity: 44lbs Dimensions: 14.6″x9.3″ Height Adjustable Levels: 3.9″, 4.7″, 5.5″

Design: Large 14.6 x 9.3 inches durable metal shelf fit most flat screen display, laptop and printer, maximum support weight up to 44lbs (20kg). Anti-skid rubber pads prevent slipping or damage to your work surface.
Ergonomic: Raise computer monitor, notebook or any device by 3.9 inches, 4.7 inches or 5.5 inches off the desk to create a comfortable viewing position and a healthier sitting position which help reduce stress on the neck and back.
Ventilated: Large sturdy platform with vented holes, this stand will prevent overheating and keep the device running cool.
Organization: Sleek modern black design complements any desk while adding extra space underneath the stand for storage.
Package Includes: WALI 3 Height Adjustable Metal Monitor Stand Riser x 1, experienced and friendly US based customer support available to assist 7 days a week.
